mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_cashierdeskitem ( deskid, itemname, itemtype, creator, createtime ) values( #{deskid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime} )
mapper.update:
update t_tfs_cashierdeskitem
deskid = #{deskid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemtype = #{itemtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime},
where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
